mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_NAME AS PROD_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, SUM(B.PROD_QTY) AS SUM, DATE_FORMAT(B.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT FROM PRODUCT_INFO P, BASKET_INFO B, CATEGORY_INFO C WHERE P.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO AND P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND DATE_FORMAT(B.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{reg_dt} GROUP BY P.PROD_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(B.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY SUM DESC
